page.title: 18A Day In Samantha's Life
page.content: I live with my Mum,Dad and sister in the Odde Cottage,Cock Road,Little Maplestead.I am eight years old. My sister is called Evelyn. Last Saturday in the morning I dressed and had my breakfast.After that I went on my new roller skates. Then I went to a disco dancing class. When I got home I had a bath. I had my dinner which was chicken and potatoes. Then I helped my dad put the food in the car because it was my birthday party in the village hall. I had a lovely party with some of my friends.For my presents I had Tinkerbell Talc and Tinkerbell nail varnish.We had a Magician called Uncle Jim.He was excellent at tricks. He made me a dog out of balloons. My Grandad and Grandma came at 7.30p.m. They bought a "Guess Who?" game. I went to bed at 8.00p.m.
